duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and update virtual, printed, and computer-based training materials for Cybersecurity courses, adhering to regulations.
Deliver virtual training using various software modalities with proficiency.
Provide instruction for various Cybersecurity courses and conduct classroom instruction, maintain instructor certification, and evaluate student performance.
Collaborate with instructors and government personnel for in-residence and remote courses, staying current with industry certifications.
Administer exams, record results, provide student critiques, and maintain IA courseware and materials following government guidelines.
Review and update course documentation to reflect current technology and training needs, analyze student and customer feedback for continuous improvement.

Attend meetings and conferences to stay informed and contribute to curriculum development, work with government personnel to establish courseware prerequisites, and recommend new courses and training materials.

education_certification.credential: Industry certifications such as CISSP, CASP, or equivalent preferred
Prior experience in cybersecurity and the IA field
